__e: The wolves are back and they're hungry. It's natural.
I think all the wolves are beginning to trust me more.
Well, you clear those things away, will you and I'll get rid of these.
It was he that saved you from the wolves and raised you up to all of this.
It's great to see all this other life, but I'm missing my wolf family and my time is running out.
Thought you said that was dangerous, what with all the wolves and such?
And if it wasn't for the wolves, You wouldn't be able to walk anywhere.
If you want this Lobos guy, I can't do nothin' for you.
We're only safe here in the valley as long as the wolves don't know it exists.
It wasn't Lobos who was trying to kill me.
We have a house full of wolves that need to eat.
It's not the other wolves you need to worry about.
"As wolves at lambing" is his word for you all.
No matter how fierce the wolves are... without their teeth they are nothing
We have to work together with snow wolf now
Did you leave the werewolves out because of me?
You know he was involved with the Lobos murder, somehow.
